draft_response.subject: Re: Can't login to my account
draft_response.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for reaching out — I understand you’re seeing an invalid session error while logging in.

Try this:
1) Clear cookies/cache for the site
2) Try an incognito window
3) Use the password reset flow if the issue persists

If it still fails, reply with a screenshot of the error and your browser + OS version.

Best,
Support Team
